casebody.data:
In re R.L.C. No. 531A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2006. Constance Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for R.L.C. Michael Kent Curtis, Winston-Salem, Shannon Gilreath, Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for NCATL, et al. Theresa A. Newman, for Professor Erwin Chemerinsky.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of November 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief to Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 11th day of December 2006 to file and serve his/her reply brief with this Court. By order of *549the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2006."
